mapper.select: select id, restroom_name, wgs84_latitude, wgs84_longitude from restroom where wgs84_latitude between #{south} and #{north} and wgs84_longitude between #{west} and #{east};
select * from restroom where wgs84_latitude between #{south} and #{north} and wgs84_longitude between #{west} and #{east};
select id from (select id, sqrt(pow(wgs84_latitude - 35.86125470017899, 2) + pow(wgs84_longitude - 128.55601490000004, 2)) as len from restroom order by len limit 1) as t;
